Supercharge your Google Meet experience with GM Pro, the ultimate Chrome extension for enhancing chat functionality in your meetings! Whether you're a frequent user or just want to take your Meet experience to the next level, GM Pro offers a wide range of features designed to improve chat interaction, streamline communication, and provide advanced tools for both casual and professional use. ğŸš€

    Pick one person from the attendee list or shuffle the entire participants listâ€”perfect for meetings where everyone needs to take turns sharing, such as standups and retrospectives.

Why GM Pro?
GM Pro is continuously updated with new features and improvements based on user feedback and extensive testing. The extension is designed to seamlessly integrate into your Google Meet experience, adding powerful new tools while maintaining ease of use. ğŸ”§âœ¨
